duties_responsibilities.duty: Design HVAC systems including ductwork, piping, controls, etc. for commercial buildings.
Perform load calculations for heating and cooling needs.
Provide design on design-build projects and assistance to project managers on design-assist projects.
Maintain organized records of active projects.
Assist with technical interpretation and writing of RFI's as need arises.
Maintain high level of competency in HVAC industry through continued education and training.

education_certification.credential: Preferred 4-year engineering degree or 2-year technical college education. Related industry experience will also be considered. Candidate will have opportunity to pursue professional engineering or designer of engineering credentials from state of Wisconsin.
